job.title: AI/ML- Machine Learning Engineer, Information Intelligence
job.description: brstrongSummarybrstrong brThe AIML  Information Intelligence teams are creating groundbreaking technology for algorithmic search machine learning natural language processing and artificial intelligence The features we create are redefining how hundreds of millions of people use their computers and mobile devices to search and find what they are looking for Our universal search engine powers search features across a variety of Apple products including Siri Spotlight Safari Messages and Lookup As part of this group you will work with one of the most exciting high performance computing environments with petabytes of data millions of queries per second and have an opportunity to imagine and build products that delight our customers every daybrbr brstrongKey Qualificationsbrstrong brExperience with one or more general purpose programming languages including but not limited to Go CC Java or PythonbrbrExperience with search engine information retrieval machine learning NLP is a plusbrbrExperience working with large data sets and pipelines eg MapReduce Spark is a plusbrbrExcellent analytical and problem solving skillsbrbrCan write clean and effective code following modern software engineering best practicesbrbrAppetite to dig into datalogs and features to figure out why something does not work as expectedbrbr2 years experience writing code which runs in containerized KubernetesMesosBorg environment a plusbrbr brstrongDescriptionbrstrong br Design and build infrastructures to support features that empowers billions of Apple usersbrbr Perform language processing statistical analysis and query analysis to support your hypothesis for how to improve productoutcomesbrbr Leverage proprietary MapReduce platform to process web scale data to deliver product features and improvementsbrbr Design amp rundeploy various metrics and evaluations of featuresimprovements using a variety of tools like grading logs processing prelaunch and holdback ABsbrbr Present results of analysis to team and leadership across Applebrbr brstrongEducation amp Experiencebrstrong brBS in Computer Science Mathematics Statistics or a related field or equivalent proven experience MastersPhD preferredbrbr brRole Number 200224378brbr
